counter.documentation: Description: This is an example DU counter Trigger: This is an example DU counter
counter.description: This is an example DU counter
counter.trigger: This is an example DU counter

counter.documentation: Description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB data in UE dedicated downlink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A Trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.
counter.description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB data in UE dedicated downlink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeDlSum counter is incremented. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped at every update of sum counter when there is at least one active UE. Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.
counter.description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeDlSum counter is incremented. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped at every update of sum counter when there is at least one active UE. Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of active UE instances that have DRB data in UE-dedicated downlink buffer. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.
counter.description: Number of active UE instances that have DRB data in UE-dedicated downlink buffer. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeDlSum counter is updated, regardless if there are any active UEs, that is, once every slot. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.
counter.description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeDlSum counter is updated, regardless if there are any active UEs, that is, once every slot. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.

counter.documentation: Description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB or SRB data in UE uplink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A Trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.
counter.description: Peak number of active UEs that have DRB or SRB data in UE uplink buffer. Value is maximum of a set of samples, where following conditions apply: - Throughout measurement period, each sample is an average of active UEs. Rounding method can cause counter to show one less than real number of UEs. - Sample is taken every second. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Set to maximum of all average samples of (ActiveUeSum divided by ActiveUeSamp) made over ROP. Includes only those UEs that have control plane termination in this cell.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeUlSum counter is incremented. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped at every update of sum counter when there is at least one active UE. Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.
counter.description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeUlSum counter is incremented. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped at every update of sum counter when there is at least one active UE. Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE instances considered active in uplink direction. UE is considered to have DRB or SRB data in its buffer. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.
counter.description: Number of UE instances considered active in uplink direction. UE is considered to have DRB or SRB data in its buffer. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped for each active UE instance in each slot.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeUlSum counter is updated, regardless if there are any active UEs, that is, once every slot. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.
counter.description: Number of times corresponding pmActiveUeUlSum counter is updated, regardless if there are any active UEs, that is, once every slot. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped when corresponding sum counter is scanned.

counter.documentation: Description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.serviceStatus is set to OUT_OF_SERVICE. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds Trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.
counter.description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.serviceStatus is set to OUT_OF_SERVICE. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds
counter.trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.

counter.documentation: Description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.administrativeState, or another MO the cell depends on, is locked by operator. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds Trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.
counter.description: Period when cell is disabled because NRCellDU.administrativeState, or another MO the cell depends on, is locked by operator. Incremented only when gNodeB is operational. Unit: seconds
counter.trigger: Stepped each second when conditions are met.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of rejected establishments of DRB with rate-controlled schedulers. Rejection caused by attempt to use more rate-controlled schedulers than limit and DRB overload handling is set to REJECT. Trigger: Stepped when DRB establishment with rate-controlled scheduling algorithm was rejected due to DRB overload handling setting REJECT.
counter.description: Number of rejected establishments of DRB with rate-controlled schedulers. Rejection caused by attempt to use more rate-controlled schedulers than limit and DRB overload handling is set to REJECT.
counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB establishment with rate-controlled scheduling algorithm was rejected due to DRB overload handling setting REJECT.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of rejected establishments of DRB with rate-controlled schedulers. Rejection caused by attempt to use more rate-controlled schedulers than limit and DRB overload handling is set to REJECT. Trigger: Stepped when DRB establishment with rate-controlled scheduling algorithm was rejected due to DRB overload handling setting REJECT.
counter.description: Number of rejected establishments of DRB with rate-controlled schedulers. Rejection caused by attempt to use more rate-controlled schedulers than limit and DRB overload handling is set to REJECT.
counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB establishment with rate-controlled scheduling algorithm was rejected due to DRB overload handling setting REJECT.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful DRB establishments with configured Dynamic Slot Aggregation for each 5QI. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with configured Dynamic Slot Aggregation.
counter.description: Number of successful DRB establishments with configured Dynamic Slot Aggregation for each 5QI. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with configured Dynamic Slot Aggregation.

counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with configured Dynamic Slot Aggregation.

counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established, without configured Dynamic Slot Aggregation due to UE not supporting PUSCH Repetition Type A.

counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established, without configured Dynamic Slot Aggregation due to UE not supporting PUSCH Repetition Type A.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful establishments of DRB that requested rate-controlled schedulers. Trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with requested rate-controlled scheduler or with rate-controlled scheduler with basic QoS.
counter.description: Number of successful establishments of DRB that requested rate-controlled schedulers.
counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with requested rate-controlled scheduler or with rate-controlled scheduler with basic QoS.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful establishments of DRB that requested rate-controlled schedulers. Trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with requested rate-controlled scheduler or with rate-controlled scheduler with basic QoS.
counter.description: Number of successful establishments of DRB that requested rate-controlled schedulers.
counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with requested rate-controlled scheduler or with rate-controlled scheduler with basic QoS.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful DRB establishments with rate-controlled schedulers with basic QoS. Basic QoS is default scheduling algorithm of RESOURCE FAIR and priority domain 48. Trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with basic QoS but rate-controlled scheduler is requested.
counter.description: Number of successful DRB establishments with rate-controlled schedulers with basic QoS. Basic QoS is default scheduling algorithm of RESOURCE FAIR and priority domain 48.
counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with basic QoS but rate-controlled scheduler is requested.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful DRB establishments with rate-controlled schedulers with basic QoS. Basic QoS is default scheduling algorithm of RESOURCE FAIR and priority domain 48. Trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with basic QoS but rate-controlled scheduler is requested.

counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully established with basic QoS but rate-controlled scheduler is requested.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of rejected modifications of existing DRB to use rate-controlled schedulers. Rejection caused by attempt to use more rate-controlled schedulers than limit and DRB overload handling is set to REJECT. Trigger: Stepped when DRB modification with rate-controlled scheduling algorithm was rejected due to DRB overload handling setting REJECT.

counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB modification with rate-controlled scheduling algorithm was rejected due to DRB overload handling setting REJECT.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful DRB modifications with rate-controlled schedulers. Trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully modified with requested rate-controlled scheduler or with rate-controlled scheduler with basic QoS.
counter.description: Number of successful DRB modifications with rate-controlled schedulers.

counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB is successfully modified with rate-controlled schedulers with basic QoS.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS without DRX impact and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in an empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each QoS without DRX impact and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in an empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS without DRX and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink MAC latency measurements for each QoS without DRX and out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_ACTIVE state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of carrier aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for downlink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped when DL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - Regardless of being used for DL transmission or not.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for downlink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped when DL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - Regardless of being used for DL transmission or not.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for uplink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped when UL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - As SRS in symbols of guard band.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols available for uplink transmission during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped when UL resource block symbols are used in one of the following cases: - Based on configuration. - After considering spectrum sharing. - As SRS in symbols of guard band.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for CSI-RS, TRS, and CSI-IM during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for CSI-RS, including TRS and CSI-IM. Truncation of (Number of resource element symbols / 12) is equal to number of resource block symbols.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for CSI-RS, TRS, and CSI-IM during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for CSI-RS, including TRS and CSI-IM. Truncation of (Number of resource element symbols / 12) is equal to number of resource block symbols.

counter.documentation: Description: Measures maximum normal partition utilization for downlink resource block symbols. Trigger: Updated at end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by periodic sampling.
counter.description: Measures maximum normal partition utilization for downlink resource block symbols.
counter.trigger: Updated at end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by periodic sampling.

counter.documentation: Description: Measures maximum normal partition utilization for uplink resource block symbols. Trigger: Updated at end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by periodic sampling.
counter.description: Measures maximum normal partition utilization for uplink resource block symbols.
counter.trigger: Updated at end of ROP with maximum value during ROP. Provides maximum value reported by periodic sampling.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type A.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B. DMRS and PTRS embedded in resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used by PDCCH for scheduling of PDSCH or PUSCH using mapping type B.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A broadcasting during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A broadcasting. Counts DL resource block symbols used for Synchronization Signal (SS) PBCH, BCCH, and PCCH including SIBs and Random Access (RA) Msg2.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PDSCH mapping type A broadcasting during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PDSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PDSCH resource element mapping type A broadcasting. Counts DL resource block symbols used for Synchronization Signal (SS) PBCH, BCCH, and PCCH including SIBs and Random Access (RA) Msg2.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PUSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PUSCH mapping type A.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type A during complete ROP. DMRS and PTRS embedded in PUSCH resources are included. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each downlink resource block symbol used for PUSCH mapping type A.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type B during complete ROP. Unit: N/A Trigger: Incremented for each uplink resource block symbol used by PUSCH type B.
counter.description: Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for PUSCH mapping type B during complete ROP. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Incremented for each uplink resource block symbol used by PUSCH type B.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of carrier aggregation SCell partition utilization for downlink resource block symbols averaged over 1 second. Unit: N/A Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..5] % Bin[1]: [6..10] % Bin[2]: [11..15] % Bin[3]: [16..20] % Bin[4]: [21..25] % Bin[5]: [26..30] % Bin[6]: [31..35] % Bin[7]: [36..40] % Bin[8]: [41..45] % Bin[9]: [46..50] % Bin[10]: [51..55] % Bin[11]: [56..60] % Bin[12]: [61..65] % Bin[13]: [66..70] % Bin[14]: [71..75] % Bin[15]: [76..80] % Bin[16]: [81..85] % Bin[17]: [86..90] % Bin[18]: [91..95] % Bin[19]: [96..100] % Trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Number of used PDSCH resource block symbols for carrier aggregation SCell partition in 1 second. - Total aggregated number of resource block symbols available for downlink transmission in 1 second.
counter.trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Number of used PDSCH resource block symbols for carrier aggregation SCell partition in 1 second. - Total aggregated number of resource block symbols available for downlink transmission in 1 second.

counter.trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Aggregated number of resource block symbols used for all UL channels in 1 second. - Aggregated number of available UL resource block symbols in 1 second.

Unit: N/A Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..5] % Bin[1]: [6..10] % Bin[2]: [11..15] % Bin[3]: [16..20] % Bin[4]: [21..25] % Bin[5]: [26..30] % Bin[6]: [31..35] % Bin[7]: [36..40] % Bin[8]: [41..45] % Bin[9]: [46..50] % Bin[10]: [51..55] % Bin[11]: [56..60] % Bin[12]: [61..65] % Bin[13]: [66..70] % Bin[14]: [71..75] % Bin[15]: [76..80] % Bin[16]: [81..85] % Bin[17]: [86..90] % Bin[18]: [91..95] % Bin[19]: [96..100] % Trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Number of used PUSCH resource block symbols for normal partition in 1 second. - Total aggregated number of resource block symbols available for uplink transmission in 1 second.
counter.trigger: Calculated based on following numbers: - Number of used PUSCH resource block symbols for normal partition in 1 second. - Total aggregated number of resource block symbols available for uplink transmission in 1 second.

Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..49] kbps Bin[1]: [50..69] kbps Bin[2]: [70..99] kbps Bin[3]: [100..149] kbps Bin[4]: [150..199] kbps Bin[5]: [200..299] kbps Bin[6]: [300..499] kbps Bin[7]: [500..699] kbps Bin[8]: [700..999] kbps Bin[9]: [1000..1499] kbps Bin[10]: [1500..1999] kbps Bin[11]: [2000..2999] kbps Bin[12]: [3000..4999] kbps Bin[13]: [5000..6999] kbps Bin[14]: [7000..10000] kbps Bin[15]: [10001..15000] kbps Bin[16]: [15001..20000] kbps Bin[17]: [20001..30000] kbps Bin[18]: [30001..50000] kbps Bin[19]: [50001..70000] kbps Bin[20]: [70001..100000] kbps Bin[21]: [100001..150000] kbps Bin[22]: [150001..] kbps Trigger: Distribution of uplink cell throughput, sampled once every second.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of successfully transmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell or SCell. Unit: bytes Trigger: All successfully transmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. Cell can be PCell or SCell. Msg4 is excluded. Bandwidth-reduced UE instances are excluded.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of successfully transmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell or SCell. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: All successfully transmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. Cell can be PCell or SCell. Msg4 is excluded. Bandwidth-reduced UE instances are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of successfully transmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell, SCell or extSCell. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: bytes Trigger: All successfully transmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. Cell can be PCell, SCell or extSCell. Msg4 is excluded. Bandwidth-reduced UE instances are excluded.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of successfully transmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell, SCell or extSCell. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: All successfully transmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. Cell can be PCell, SCell or extSCell. Msg4 is excluded. Bandwidth-reduced UE instances are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink. Unit: bytes Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received from DRBs and SRBs when cell is used as PCell or SCell.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received from DRBs and SRBs when cell is used as PCell or SCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in UL PCell, SCell or extSCell. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: bytes Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received from DRBs and SRBs when cell is used as PCell, SCell or extSCell.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in UL PCell, SCell or extSCell. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received from DRBs and SRBs when cell is used as PCell, SCell or extSCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PDSCH. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where PDSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.
counter.description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PDSCH. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where PDSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots with downlink PDSCH scheduling activity. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where there is at least one SRB or DRB PDSCH scheduling activity. Other scheduling activities are excluded.
counter.description: Total duration of slots with downlink PDSCH scheduling activity. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where there is at least one SRB or DRB PDSCH scheduling activity. Other scheduling activities are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots with downlink PDSCH scheduling activity. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where there is at least one SRB or DRB PDSCH scheduling activity. Other scheduling activities (Msg2 or Msg4, pagging, SI, and so on) are excluded.
counter.description: Total duration of slots with downlink PDSCH scheduling activity. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where there is at least one SRB or DRB PDSCH scheduling activity. Other scheduling activities (Msg2 or Msg4, pagging, SI, and so on) are excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where PUSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.
counter.description: Total duration of slots where gNodeB scheduler can schedule on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where PUSCH is available, regardless if any UE is scheduled.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots where at least one MAC SDU is received on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where at least one MAC SDU is successfully received.
counter.description: Total duration of slots where at least one MAC SDU is received on PUSCH. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where at least one MAC SDU is successfully received.

counter.documentation: Description: Total duration of slots where at least one MAC SDU is received on PUSCH. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Stepped for each slot where at least one MAC SDU is successfully received.
counter.description: Total duration of slots where at least one MAC SDU is received on PUSCH. Applicable flexible filter is PlmnId. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Stepped for each slot where at least one MAC SDU is successfully received.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of CBRA Msg2 scheduling attempts. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped at each Msg2 scheduling attempt.
counter.description: Number of CBRA Msg2 scheduling attempts. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped at each Msg2 scheduling attempt.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of detected CBRA Msg1 preambles. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped at each received preamble.
counter.description: Number of detected CBRA Msg1 preambles. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped at each received preamble.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully detected random access Msg3 messages for CBRA. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped at each successful detection of Msg3.
counter.description: Number of successfully detected random access Msg3 messages for CBRA. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped at each successful detection of Msg3.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of CFRA Msg2 scheduling attempts. Unit: messages Trigger: Incremented by one with each CFRA Msg2 scheduling attempt.
counter.description: Number of CFRA Msg2 scheduling attempts. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Incremented by one with each CFRA Msg2 scheduling attempt.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of detected CFRA preambles (Msg1). Unit: messages Trigger: Incremented with each CFRA preamble that has been allocated to a UE is detected in the cell.
counter.description: Number of detected CFRA preambles (Msg1). Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Incremented with each CFRA preamble that has been allocated to a UE is detected in the cell.

counter.documentation: Description: The number of successfully completed CFRA procedures, i.e., Msg2 is successfully received at UE side. It is measured by non-DTX detection of PUSCH scheduled by RAR UL grant at gNB side. Unit: messages Trigger: Incremented when PUSCH scheduled by RAR UL grant is received as non-DTX after a CFRA preamble has been received.
counter.description: The number of successfully completed CFRA procedures, i.e., Msg2 is successfully received at UE side. It is measured by non-DTX detection of PUSCH scheduled by RAR UL grant at gNB side. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Incremented when PUSCH scheduled by RAR UL grant is received as non-DTX after a CFRA preamble has been received.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of RRCSetupRequest messages received in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of RRCSetupRequest messages received in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331, RRC Setup Request. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is received in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of rejected RRCSetupRequest messages because of priority-based admission control in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS38.331, RRC Reject. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is rejected because of admission control in gNodeB-DU node.
counter.description: Number of rejected RRCSetupRequest messages because of priority-based admission control in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS38.331, RRC Reject. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is rejected because of admission control in gNodeB-DU node.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully processed RRCSetupRequest messages in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is succesfully processed in gNodeB-DU node and forwarded to gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of successfully processed RRCSetupRequest messages in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCSetupRequest message is succesfully processed in gNodeB-DU node and forwarded to gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of RRCReestablishmentRequest messages received in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.311, RRC Reestablishment Request. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is received in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of RRCReestablishmentRequest messages received in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.311, RRC Reestablishment Request. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is received in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of rejected RRCReestablishmentRequest messages because of priority-based admission control in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is rejected because of admission control in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of rejected RRCReestablishmentRequest messages because of priority-based admission control in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is rejected because of admission control in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of failed RRC Reestablishment procedures because of connection intensity control. Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is ignored in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of failed RRC Reestablishment procedures because of connection intensity control.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is ignored in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of failed RRC Reestablishment procedures because of Baseband MP load control. Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is ignored in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of failed RRC Reestablishment procedures because of Baseband MP load control.
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is ignored in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully processed RRCReestablishmentRequest messages in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is succesfully processed in gNodeB-DU and forwarded to gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of successfully processed RRCReestablishmentRequest messages in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCReestablishmentRequest message is succesfully processed in gNodeB-DU and forwarded to gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of RRCResumeRequest messages received in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.311, RRC Resume Request. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCResumeRequest message is received in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of RRCResumeRequest messages received in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.311, RRC Resume Request. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCResumeRequest message is received in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of rejected RRCResumeRequest messages because of priority-based admission control in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS38.331, RRC Reject. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCResumeRequest message is rejected because of admission control in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of rejected RRCResumeRequest messages because of priority-based admission control in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS38.331, RRC Reject. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCResumeRequest message is rejected because of admission control in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of failed RRC Resume procedures because of connection intensity control. Trigger: Stepped for each failed RRC Resume procedure.
counter.description: Number of failed RRC Resume procedures because of connection intensity control.
counter.trigger: Stepped for each failed RRC Resume procedure.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of failed RRC Resume procedures in NR SA because Baseband MP load control indicates OVERLOAD or VERY HIGH state. Trigger: Stepped for each failed RRC Resume procedure because Baseband MP load control indicates OVERLOAD or VERY HIGH state.
counter.description: Number of failed RRC Resume procedures in NR SA because Baseband MP load control indicates OVERLOAD or VERY HIGH state.
counter.trigger: Stepped for each failed RRC Resume procedure because Baseband MP load control indicates OVERLOAD or VERY HIGH state.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successfully processed RRCResumeRequest messages in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages Trigger: Stepped when RRCResumeRequest message is succesfully processed in gNodeB-DU and forwarded to gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of successfully processed RRCResumeRequest messages in gNodeB-DU. See 3GPP TS 38.331. Unit: messages
counter.trigger: Stepped when RRCResumeRequest message is succesfully processed in gNodeB-DU and forwarded to gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE context modification attempts. Separate counter for each result. See Lists and Delta Lists in CPI Library for applicable results. Trigger: Stepped when F1AP UE Context Modification procedure ends, and procedure is initiated by reception of F1AP UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message from gNodeB-CU, or procedure is initiated by transmission of F1AP UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUIRED message from gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of UE context modification attempts. Separate counter for each result. See Lists and Delta Lists in CPI Library for applicable results.
counter.trigger: Stepped when F1AP UE Context Modification procedure ends, and procedure is initiated by reception of F1AP UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message from gNodeB-CU, or procedure is initiated by transmission of F1AP UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUIRED message from gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE context releases initiated by gNodeB-CU. Separate counter for each 3GPP cause group and cause from 3GPP TS 38.473. Trigger: Stepped when UE context is released in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of UE context releases initiated by gNodeB-CU. Separate counter for each 3GPP cause group and cause from 3GPP TS 38.473.
counter.trigger: Stepped when UE context is released in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE context releases initiated by gNodeB-DU. Separate counter for each 3GPP cause group and cause from 3GPP TS 38.473. Trigger: Stepped when UE context is released in gNodeB-DU.
counter.description: Number of UE context releases initiated by gNodeB-DU. Separate counter for each 3GPP cause group and cause from 3GPP TS 38.473.
counter.trigger: Stepped when UE context is released in gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE Context Setup attempts in gNodeB-DU. Trigger: Stepped when UE CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message is received from gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of UE Context Setup attempts in gNodeB-DU.
counter.trigger: Stepped when UE CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message is received from gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of times a UE Context Setup procedure fails in gNodeB-DU because UE capability does not match NRCellDU capability. Trigger: Stepped when UE Context Setup fails due to an unsuccessful UE capability check.
counter.description: Number of times a UE Context Setup procedure fails in gNodeB-DU because UE capability does not match NRCellDU capability.
counter.trigger: Stepped when UE Context Setup fails due to an unsuccessful UE capability check.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE context setup attempts. Separate counter for each result. See Lists and Delta Lists in CPI Library for applicable results. Trigger: Stepped when F1AP UE Context Setup procedure ends, and procedure is initiated by reception of F1AP UE CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message from gNodeB-CU.
counter.description: Number of UE context setup attempts. Separate counter for each result. See Lists and Delta Lists in CPI Library for applicable results.
counter.trigger: Stepped when F1AP UE Context Setup procedure ends, and procedure is initiated by reception of F1AP UE CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message from gNodeB-CU.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of successful UE Context Setup procedures in gNodeB-DU. Trigger: Stepped when UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message is received. Reconfiguration Complete Indicator must be set to TRUE after successful F1AP UE Context Setup procedure.
counter.description: Number of successful UE Context Setup procedures in gNodeB-DU.
counter.trigger: Stepped when UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message is received. Reconfiguration Complete Indicator must be set to TRUE after successful F1AP UE Context Setup procedure.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution for each configured SR periodicity pool. counter.trigger: Stepped at any UE Context Setup or Modification when SR periodicity pool is configured.

counter.description: Distribution for each preferred SR periodicity pool. Unit: N/A Ranges: Bin[0]: SRPeriodicityPool1 Bin[1]: SRPeriodicityPool2 Bin[2]: SRPeriodicityPool3 Bin[3]: SRPeriodicityPool4 Bin[4]: SRPeriodicityPool5 Bin[5]: SRPeriodicityPoolMax
counter.trigger: Stepped at any UE Context Setup or Modification when preferred SR periodicity pool is requested.

counter.trigger: Stepped at any UE Context Setup or Modification when preferred SR periodicity pool is requested.

counter.documentation: Description: Number of UE with Uplink Configured Grant. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped for each UE with Uplink Configured Grant.
counter.description: Number of UE with Uplink Configured Grant. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped for each UE with Uplink Configured Grant.

counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB session share of restricted volume is below 10% and MAC volume is larger than or equal to 10 MB.

counter.description: Number of MBB DRBs excluded from downlink throughput calculation because of short transport time.
counter.trigger: Stepped when DRB session time is less than 50 ms and MAC volume is larger than or equal to 10 MB.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of BLER in downlink using 16-QAM modulation. counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each DRB with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of Carrier Aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for downlink MAC latency measurement for each DRB with DRX impact but without out-of-sync impact. DL MAC latency measures MAC scheduling latency between reception of packet in empty DL buffer and transmission of first packet. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped at DL MAC latency measurement when the following conditions apply: - UE is in DRX_SLEEP state and in UL in-sync state. - First packet is received in empty DL buffer. In case of Carrier Aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

In case of Carrier Aggregation, first packet transmission can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Counter that records time overlap between carrier aggregation data bursts, where the original data burst time is overlapped with subsequent data burst times due to scheduling delay on external SCell. This time is subtracted from other counters intended for user throughput calculation. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped when original and subsequent burst overlap.
counter.description: Counter that records time overlap between carrier aggregation data bursts, where the original data burst time is overlapped with subsequent data burst times due to scheduling delay on external SCell. This time is subtracted from other counters intended for user throughput calculation. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped when original and subsequent burst overlap.

counter.documentation: Description: Counter that records time overlap between carrier aggregation data bursts where the original data burst time is overlapped with subsequent data burst times due to scheduling delay on external SCell. Accumulates measured time from all DRBs with same QoS. This time is subtracted from other counters intended for user throughput calculation. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped when original burst overlaps with subsequent burst due to scheduling delay on external SCell.
counter.description: Counter that records time overlap between carrier aggregation data bursts where the original data burst time is overlapped with subsequent data burst times due to scheduling delay on external SCell. Accumulates measured time from all DRBs with same QoS. This time is subtracted from other counters intended for user throughput calculation. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped when original burst overlaps with subsequent burst due to scheduling delay on external SCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell or PSCell. Unit: bytes Trigger: HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB using cell as PCell or PSCell. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB or SRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB using cell as SCell. Unit: bytes Trigger: HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. SRB data is not transmitted from SCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted downlink MAC PDUs for DRB using cell as SCell. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: HARQ initially transmitted and retransmitted DL MAC PDUs for DRB from cell are included. Possible padding bits in DL MAC PDUs are counted. SRB data is not transmitted from SCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of PDSCH resource block symbols used for each downlink DRB. Limited to initial transmission. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped only in PCell node, for transmission on PCell and local SCells for initial DRB transmission.

counter.trigger: Stepped only in PCell node, for transmission on PCell and local SCells for initial DRB transmission.

counter.trigger: Stepped for each UE by number of downlink SCells after successful activation by gNodeB-DU.

counter.trigger: Stepped for each UE by number of downlink SCells after successful deactivation by gNodeB-DU.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of downlink DRB since last scheduled DRB (delta time between scheduling occasions). Meanwhile, there is data in buffer. Unit: 125 us Trigger: Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer is excluded. HARQ retransmission is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of downlink DRB since last scheduled DRB (delta time between scheduling occasions). Meanwhile, there is data in buffer. Unit: 125 us
counter.trigger: Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer is excluded. HARQ retransmission is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of downlink DRB, while there is data in buffer. Accumulates measured time from all DRBs with same QoS. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Following cases are excluded: - Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer. - HARQ retransmission. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of downlink DRB, while there is data in buffer. Accumulates measured time from all DRBs with same QoS. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Following cases are excluded: - Last scheduling occasion for HARQ initial transmission to drain DRB buffer. - HARQ retransmission. In case of carrier aggregation, HARQ initial transmission scheduling can be in PCell or SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of single slot short burst cases of downlink DRB while there is data in buffer. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of single slot short burst cases of downlink DRB while there is data in buffer. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of single slot short burst cases of downlink DRB while there is data in buffer. counter.description: Aggregated time for HARQ initial transmission scheduling of single slot short burst cases of downlink DRB while there is data in buffer. Accumulates measured time from all DRBs with same QoS. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: 125 microseconds
counter.trigger: Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Transfer time of restricted uplink data volume. Unit: 125 microseconds Trigger: Stepped from reception of first MAC PDU in a burst until reception of second last slot.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: HARQ initial transmission in single-burst and in last slot of burst is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: HARQ initial transmission in single-burst and in last slot of burst is excluded. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission in last slot of burst when buffer is emptied for each DRB. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: byte Trigger: For carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs in last slot of burst transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission in last slot of burst when buffer is emptied for each DRB. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: For carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs in last slot of burst transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission in last slot of the burst that overlaps with the subsequent burst when buffer is emptied. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: All downlink MAC SDUs in last slot of the burst that overlaps with the subsequent burst transmitted from PCell and SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission in last slot of the burst that overlaps with the subsequent burst when buffer is emptied. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: All downlink MAC SDUs in last slot of the burst that overlaps with the subsequent burst transmitted from PCell and SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission in last slot of the burst that overlaps with the subsequent burst when buffer is emptied for each QoS. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: All downlink MAC SDUs in last slot of first burst that overlaps with subsequent burst transmitted from PCell and SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission in last slot of the burst that overlaps with the subsequent burst when buffer is emptied for each QoS. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: All downlink MAC SDUs in last slot of first burst that overlaps with subsequent burst transmitted from PCell and SCell. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each QoS. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: The following cases are excluded: - HARQ initial transmission in last slot of burst. - HARQ initial transmission in single burst. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each QoS. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: The following cases are excluded: - HARQ initial transmission in last slot of burst. - HARQ initial transmission in single burst. In case of carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs for single-burst cases that are transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. Single-burst case is when new packet arrives to empty buffer and buffer is drained by single scheduling occasion. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: byte Trigger: For carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs for single-burst cases transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs for single-burst cases that are transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. Single-burst case is when new packet arrives to empty buffer and buffer is drained by single scheduling occasion. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: For carrier aggregation, all DL MAC SDUs for single-burst cases transmitted from PCell and SCell are included. Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs for single slot short burst cases that are transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. Single slot short burst case is when new packet arrives to empty buffer and buffer is drained by single scheduling occasion on each active component carrier. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs for single slot short burst cases that are transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each DRB. Single slot short burst case is when new packet arrives to empty buffer and buffer is drained by single scheduling occasion on each active component carrier. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs for single slot short burst cases that are transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each QoS. Single slot short burst case is when new packet arrives to empty buffer and buffer is drained by single scheduling occasion on each active component carrier. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes Trigger: Counter is accumulated in PCell.
counter.description: Aggregated volume of downlink MAC SDUs for single slot short burst cases that are transmitted for HARQ initial transmission for each QoS. Single slot short burst case is when new packet arrives to empty buffer and buffer is drained by single scheduling occasion on each active component carrier. HARQ retransmission is excluded. Unit: bytes
counter.trigger: Counter is accumulated in PCell.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink as part of a burst while being restricted by air interface. Data volume received in last slot in burst is excluded. Unit: byte Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, and it results in a data burst. Volume received in last slot is excluded.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink as part of a burst while being restricted by air interface. Data volume received in last slot in burst is excluded. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, and it results in a data burst. Volume received in last slot is excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink while restricted by air interface. Received in last slot in burst. Unit: byte Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL in last slot in burst. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, resulting in data burst. Last slot can come with BSR indicating empty UE buffer or MAC PDU corresponding to last grant given by gNodeB to empty UE buffer.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink while restricted by air interface. Received in last slot in burst. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL in last slot in burst. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, resulting in data burst. Last slot can come with BSR indicating empty UE buffer or MAC PDU corresponding to last grant given by gNodeB to empty UE buffer.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs is successfully received in uplink after being restricted by air interface. Received after last slot of burst. Unit: byte Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL after last slot in burst. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, resulting in data burst.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs is successfully received in uplink after being restricted by air interface. Received after last slot of burst. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in UL after last slot in burst. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, resulting in data burst.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink while not restricted by air interface. Received in last slot in burst. Unit: byte Trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in uplink in last slot in burst. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, resulting in data burst. Last slot comes with BSR indicating empty UE buffer or MAC PDU corresponding to last grant given by gNodeB to empty UE buffer.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs successfully received in uplink while not restricted by air interface. Received in last slot in burst. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: Stepped when data is successfully received in uplink in last slot in burst. Data is sent using one of multiple grants on PUSCH needed to empty UE buffer, resulting in data burst. Last slot comes with BSR indicating empty UE buffer or MAC PDU corresponding to last grant given by gNodeB to empty UE buffer.

counter.documentation: Description: Data volume in MAC SDUs is successfully received in uplink and not restricted by air interface. Unit: byte Trigger: Stepped in one of the following cases: - Data is successfully received in UL when only one grant on PUSCH is needed to empty UE buffer. - UE buffer is unknown to gNodeB due to scheduling UE before receiving BSR.
counter.description: Data volume in MAC SDUs is successfully received in uplink and not restricted by air interface. Unit: byte
counter.trigger: Stepped in one of the following cases: - Data is successfully received in UL when only one grant on PUSCH is needed to empty UE buffer. - UE buffer is unknown to gNodeB due to scheduling UE before receiving BSR.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink radio link control delay measurements for each QoS. Unit: N/A Trigger: Stepped for each packet transmitted. SRB is excluded.
counter.description: Aggregated number of samples for downlink radio link control delay measurements for each QoS. Unit: N/A
counter.trigger: Stepped for each packet transmitted. SRB is excluded.

counter.documentation: Description: Distribution of RLC delay time. For each DRB packet, measures time in milliseconds from packet arrival in gNodeB to when last byte of this packet is scheduled and drained from RLC layer for transmission over air. Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..1[ ms Bin[1]: [1..2[ ms Bin[2]: [2..3[ ms Bin[3]: [3..4[ ms Bin[4]: [4..5[ ms Bin[5]: [5..6[ ms Bin[6]: [6..7[ ms Bin[7]: [7..8[ ms Bin[8]: [8..9[ ms Bin[9]: [9..10[ ms Bin[10]: [10..11[ ms Bin[11]: [11..12[ ms Bin[12]: [12..13[ ms Bin[13]: [13..14[ ms Bin[14]: [14..15[ ms Bin[15]: [15..16[ ms Bin[16]: [16..17[ ms Bin[17]: [17..18[ ms Bin[18]: [18..19[ ms Bin[19]: [19..20[ ms Bin[20]: [20..25[ ms Bin[21]: [25..30[ ms Bin[22]: [30..35[ ms Bin[23]: [35..40[ ms Bin[24]: [40..45[ ms Bin[25]: [45..50[ ms Bin[26]: [50..60[ ms Bin[27]: [60..70[ ms Bin[28]: [70..80[ ms Bin[29]: [80..90[ ms Bin[30]: [90..100[ ms Bin[31]: [100..] ms Trigger: Stepped for each bearer every 10 seconds, showing average RLC Packet Delay in downlink during that time.
counter.description: Distribution of RLC delay time. For each DRB packet, measures time in milliseconds from packet arrival in gNodeB to when last byte of this packet is scheduled and drained from RLC layer for transmission over air. Ranges: Bin[0]: [0..1[ ms Bin[1]: [1..2[ ms Bin[2]: [2..3[ ms Bin[3]: [3..4[ ms Bin[4]: [4..5[ ms Bin[5]: [5..6[ ms Bin[6]: [6..7[ ms Bin[7]: [7..8[ ms Bin[8]: [8..9[ ms Bin[9]: [9..10[ ms Bin[10]: [10..11[ ms Bin[11]: [11..12[ ms Bin[12]: [12..13[ ms Bin[13]: [13..14[ ms Bin[14]: [14..15[ ms Bin[15]: [15..16[ ms Bin[16]: [16..17[ ms Bin[17]: [17..18[ ms Bin[18]: [18..19[ ms Bin[19]: [19..20[ ms Bin[20]: [20..25[ ms Bin[21]: [25..30[ ms Bin[22]: [30..35[ ms Bin[23]: [35..40[ ms Bin[24]: [40..45[ ms Bin[25]: [45..50[ ms Bin[26]: [50..60[ ms Bin[27]: [60..70[ ms Bin[28]: [70..80[ ms Bin[29]: [80..90[ ms Bin[30]: [90..100[ ms Bin[31]: [100..] ms
counter.trigger: Stepped for each bearer every 10 seconds, showing average RLC Packet Delay in downlink during that time.

counter.documentation: Description: Aggregated Radio Link Control (RLC) delay time for each QoS. For each DRB packet, measures time in milliseconds from packet arrival in gNodeB to when last byte of this packet is scheduled and drained from RLC layer for transmission over air. Unit: milliseconds Trigger: Stepped for each packet transmitted. SRB is excluded.
counter.description: Aggregated Radio Link Control (RLC) delay time for each QoS. For each DRB packet, measures time in milliseconds from packet arrival in gNodeB to when last byte of this packet is scheduled and drained from RLC layer for transmission over air. Unit: milliseconds
counter.trigger: Stepped for each packet transmitted. SRB is excluded.
